Zaradi glasnih jaškov mnogi ne morejo spati
04 Nov 2019, 17:10 by L. Markelj
Šentjernej - V Šentjerneju je za mnoge ponoči zelo moteč hrup, ki ga na cesti povzročajo avtomobili z vožnjo po pokrovih kanalizacije na cestišču. Menda se sliši kot eksplozija in ljudje se pritožujejo - kdor ima slab spanec, torej zlasti starejši, imajo težave.
Na problem je že pred časom opozoril svetnik Albert Pavlič, ter povprašal o kakšnih tehničnih rešitvah, ki so nujne. Na občinski upravi so jim ti »pokrovi že prišli na uho«, saj to menda niso le težave v Šentjerneju. Zadevo so skušali rešiti s tesnili, a tiste mase menda zdržijo le nekaj časa, nato se vse ponovi. Zdaj razmišljajo o drugačnih rešitvah, najboljša bi bila sicer zamenjava celotnega pokrova, a to seveda veliko stane.
Na problem je na nedavni seji znova opozoril svetnik Franc Hudoklin, ki je občinsko vodstvo pobaral, ali so o tej problematiki kakšno rekli s predstavniki Direkcije RS za infrastrukturo, ko se že dogovarjajo za investicijo v Maharovcu. Rešitev se obeta.
Kot pravijo na Občini Šentjernej, so se o tej problematiki na državnih cestah že pogovarjali z direkcijo, nadzornikom državnih cest in upravljavcem cest, novomeškim podjetjem CGP. V načrtu je sanacija jaškov fekalne kanalizacije, za katero je predračun pridobljen. Po oktobrskem ponovnem ogledu terena je dogovorjeno, da bo sanacijo izvedel novomeški CGP, Občina Šentjernej bo plačala sanacijo jaškov fekalne kanalizacije, Direkcija RS za infrastrukturo pa sanacijo jaškov elektro in kabelske kanalizacije. Izvedba del je predvidena v začetku leta 2020. Občani seveda upajo, da bo sanacija uspešna in bodo lahko spet mirno spali.

Due to loud shafts, many are unable to sleep
04 Nov 2019, 17:10 by L. Markelj
Šentjernej - For many people in Šentjernej, it is very disturbing at night to be caused by cars driving through the covers of sewage on the roadway. It seems like a blast and people are complaining - anyone who has a bad sleep, especially the elderly, has problems.
The problem was pointed out a long time ago by Councilor Albert Pavlic, and asked about any technical solutions that are necessary. At the municipal administration, these "covers have already come to their ear", as this is not only a problem in Šentjernej. They tried to solve the problem with gaskets, but those masses seemed to last for a while, and then everything happened again. Now they are thinking of different solutions, the best would be to replace the whole lid, but of course it costs a lot.
At a recent meeting, Councilman Franc Hudoklin reiterated the problem, asking the municipal leadership whether they had anything to say with representatives of the RS Directorate for Infrastructure when they were already negotiating for an investment in Maharovac. The solution is promising.
According to the Municipality of Šentjernej, this issue has already been discussed with the Directorate, the State Roads Supervisor and the Road Manager at the CGP company in Novo mesto. The plan is to repair the sewage wells for which an invoice has been obtained. After the October re-inspection of the terrain, it is agreed that the rehabilitation of the CGP will be carried out by the Municipality of Novo mesto, the Municipality of Šentjernej will pay for the rehabilitation of the sewage shafts and the Directorate of the Infrastructure for the rehabilitation of the shafts of the electric and cable sewers. The works are scheduled to be completed in early 2020. Of course, the citizens hope that the rehabilitation will be successful and they will be able to sleep peacefully again.
